summary: This document consists of email correspondence discussing scheduling a lunch meeting with Jeffrey. Amanda Kirby and Lesley Goff are coordinating the details, including potential attendees and timing for the meeting.

persons.name: Jeffrey
persons.context: Jeffrey is mentioned as the host for a lunch meeting being scheduled.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is coordinating the lunch meeting and communicating with Lesley Goff about the schedule.

persons.name: Lesley Goff
persons.context: Lesley Goff is involved in scheduling the lunch meeting and communicating changes in the schedule.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Paul is mentioned as a potential attendee for the lunch meeting.

connections.description: Amanda and Lesley are working together to schedule a lunch meeting with Jeffrey.
Jeffrey is the host for the lunch meeting that Paul may attend.

events.title: Lunch Meeting Scheduling
events.description: Amanda Kirby and Lesley Goff discuss scheduling a lunch meeting with Jeffrey.

keyFacts: The lunch meeting is tentatively scheduled for September 30, 2013.
Amanda Kirby is coordinating the meeting and is in communication with Lesley Goff.
Jeffrey is expected to host the lunch at his home.
There is a request for the names of attendees to be sent when available.
